# defaultLanguageOption

**Instance Property**

The default language option for the group.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultLanguageOption: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0] when there’s no default language option.

## Retrieving language option group information

- **allowEmptySelection**: A Boolean that indicates whether the system requires a selection for the language option group.
- **languageOptions**: The available language options for the group.
